creditline: Gift of funds from Howard Tam, an anonymous donor, and the Linda and Lawrence Perlman Photography Endowment
description: surveyor wearing a turban standing on a triangular image of grass
signed: on back, in pencil: [Picturing Power \"Wherein one hands over the ways of seeing loot, / land and labour and thereby builds complicity / in the exculpation; you are now partners in crime\"] and [Yee I-Lann, 2013]
title: Wherein one hands over the ways of seeing loot, land and labour and thereby builds complicity in the exculpation; you are now partners in crime
